com.jidesoft.swing
Class GlobalEventQueue

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.EventQueue
        |
        +--com.jidesoft.swing.GlobalEventQueue
Deprecated. use AWTEventListener instead.

public class GlobalEventQueue
extends java.awt.EventQueue

GlobalEventQueue is an EventQueue that allows user to register a handler. Please refer to GlobalEventHandler for more details.

See Also:
GlobalEventHandler
